BuildZoom (YC W13) | San Francisco, CA | Full-Time, Onsite Only | https://www.buildzoom.com

BuildZoom simplifies the process of selecting a general contractor and improving the outcomes of remodeling and construction projects. By gathering and analyzing information on 3.5 million licensed contractors and 100 million improvement projects, we bring new levels of transparency and accountability to a notoriously difficult industry.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/buildzoom
